mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS "memberId", m.member_email AS "memberEmail", m.member_name AS "memberName", m.member_nickname AS "memberNickname", m.member_role AS "memberRole", m.member_phone AS "memberPhone", m.member_gender AS "memberGender", m.member_birth AS "memberBirth", m.member_role AS "memberRole", m.REFRESH_TOKEN AS "refreshToken", m.created_at AS "createdAt", m.modified_at AS "updatedAt", m.deleted_at AS "deletedAt", mi.info_addr AS "infoAddr", mi.info_zipcode AS "infoZipcode" FROM tbl_member m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_info mi ON m.member_id = mi.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
